captions.text: I love to play Singed, he’s a great champion
He’s basically the tank that leads the charge.
When I first started to play him, I was inspired by someone else, who 5 vs 1 the enemy team with three rod of ages.
I was like "Wow. I think this champion has great potential and this champion is like very very similar to my personality."
Just by being stubborn and drawing pressure to you, it allows your team to have more free space because if they’re all on you, then they’re not on them.
If you have a team that can speed you up like Orianna or Zilean you can find your way to the first person on the team and toss them back.
At Dreamhack, when we played against triple A when I was on Epic Gamer,
I was stuck at the tower and they had Amumu and Irelia trying to tower dive me at level 2 and they were at like level two, level three-ish.
I just sat at the tower and just was spamming laugh.
And they can’t help but get irritated.
It’s like "Oh my god I can’t kill this guy."
There’s no big secret, you gotta be careful against slowers and disablers like Janna, Anivia…
You have to understand how much punishment you can take and go straight into the hearts of enemies.
Can I like lean up into the camera?
My name is Marcus Dyrus Hill, I play for team Solo Mid Top Laner, and my favorite champion is Singed.

title: Pro Player Pick: Dyrus Picks Singed
